resources.string: SQR code will get generated for you and you are good to accept payments from customers
send audio and notes and in return get positive notes from customer
Please enter the 6-digit code sent to your phone number +91XXXXXX7890 for verification.
Turn your training into an epic game.\nLevel up and win!
Feel the adrenaline as you outrun the\nwild. It’s a race for survival
The elephant may be slow, but don’t be fooled—it picks up speed fast! As you progress, feel the ground shake with every step. Outrun the giant as it accelerates!
Push your limits, embrace the wild,\nand dominate the chase
Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

Privacy Policy
 Effective Date: [Insert Date] Primal Run ("the App") values your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your data when you use the App. 1. Information We Collect Google Authentication: When you sign in with Google, we collect your name and email address for account creation and login. Location Data: GPS data is collected during your runs to provide accurate performance tracking.

 2. How We Use Your Information For App Features: GPS data is used solely to improve run tracking and provide accurate metrics like distance, pace, and time. Marketing: Your email address may be used to send updates, promotions, or other marketing messages. You can opt out at any time. 3. Sharing Your Information

 Advertising: The App uses AdMob to display advertisements. AdMob may collect certain data as outlined in their privacy policy. Third-Party Services: Data may be shared with service providers solely to operate and improve the App. These providers are required to protect your data. 4. Data Security We implement industry-standard measures such as encryption to protect your data. However, no system is entirely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security. Users are advised to avoid sharing sensitive information unnecessarily. 5. User Rights At this time, the App does not allow users to request access, modification, or deletion of their personal data. Future updates may include such features.
This helps us personalize your experience\nand challenges
Enable GPS to track your run and boost\nyour performance
Get ready to level up your runs with exciting new challenges!
Unlock all stages and animals in both Primal Plans and Free Run modes, and enjoy an ad-free experience
Feel free to listen to your favorite\nmusic while you run
Animal sound effects change in real\ntime as your pace changes
See yourself outrun fierce animals in\na 2D platform-style race
Choose the perfect challenge, from\nbeginner to advanced mode
Feel the thrill as animals close in with\nevery step
Put Your Earphones\nOn and Get Ready
Transform Your Run\ninto a Mobile Game
Enjoy an uninterrupted experience! Subscribe to the Pro plan and remove ads before every run

An easy run is a low-intensity workout meant to be comfortable and sustainable. The pace is relaxed, allowing you to hold a conversation without much effort.\n\nIt’s a recovery run designed to improve endurance, promote blood flow, and reduce the risk of injury while giving your muscles time to recover from more intense sessions.
